title: There should be a trade off to muting
body: So people don't mute too lightly.  Make muting a purchasable item from the shop that costs 100 gold per mute and give a little xp penalty debuff,  like 10 minutes - 15%,  so that people try to work as a team instead of just trolling and shutting down like anti social people that don't really want to win.  Muting the other team can be free tho.
